name: getTextDirection
description:
Return the direction ('ltr' or 'rtl' or 'auto') of an element. If no element
is given, it returns the document's 'dir' value.

params.name: element
params.description: will use the <html> element by default

returns.description: 'ltr' or 'rtl' or 'auto' (or `undefined` if no DOM is present)

title: getTextDirection
